channel.title: Cyberus
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][font=impact]Cyberus [/font][/size][/center]
[b]Cyberus[/b] is a 317 Hyperion based server. The main goal of this project is the combat. It's going to be [B]perfect[/B]. If you are interested in helping programming the server post on my development team thread which can be found at the end of this thread.
[size=12pt][B]Basic features:[/B][/size]
[ul][*]Dropping: 0% [*]Shopping: 0% [*]Friend server: 0% [*]Trading: 0% [*]Following: 0% [*]Private messaging: 100% [*]RSA encryption: 100% [*]Enable update server: 100% [*]Multi world support: 10%[/ul]
[size=13pt] [B]Combat:[/B][/size]
[size=12pt][B]Melee:[/B][/size]
[ul][*]Weapons System: 20% [*]Specials: 10% [*]Dharok: 0% [*]Guthans: 0% [*]Veracs: 0%[/ul]
[size=12pt][B]Range:[/B][/size]
[ul][*]Crystal bow: 0% [*]Throwing knifes: 0% [*]Darts: 0% [*]Bows: 0% [*]Specials: 0%[/ul]
[size=12pt][B]Magic:[/B][/size]
[ul][*]Teleporting: 0% [*]Graphics and emotions: 0% [*]Level requirements: 0% [*]Graphics and emotions: 0% [*]All ancient effects: 0% [*]All modern effects: 0%[/ul]
[size=12pt][B]Prayer:[/B][/size]
[ul][*]Draining: 0% [*]Headicons: 0% [*]Switching: 0% [*]Thick Skin: 0% [*]Rock Skin: 0% [*]Steel Skin: 0% [*]Burst of Strength: 0% [*]Superhuman Strength: 0% [*]Ultimate Strength: 0% [*]Clarity of Thought: 0% [*]Improved Reflexes: 0% [*]Incredible reflexes: 0% [*]Rapid Restore: 0% [*]Rapid Heal: 0% [*]Protect Item: 0% [*]Protect from Magic: 0% [*]Protect from Missiles: 0% [*]Protect from Melee: 0% [*]Retribution: 0% [*]Redemption: 0% [*]Smite: 0%[/ul]
[size=12pt][B]Combat in general:[/B][/size]
[ul][*]Special script system: 100% [*]1vs1 and Multizones: 0% [*]Poisining: 0% [*]Recoil: 0% [*]Wilderness levels: 0% [*]Potions: 0% [*]Twohanded weapons: 0% [*]Ring of Life: 0% [*]Following: 0% [*]Block emotions: 0% [*]Sounds: 0% [*]Weapon speeds: 100%[/ul]
[size=12pt][B]Media:[/B][/size] [QUOTE]Todo[/QUOTE]
If you are interested in joining the team:

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

It will be finished, and thanks.

If you’re scared to apply because combat requires a shit load of formulas, that’s alright because I have already written all of them for calculating the hit and max hits. (Ive only done the melee max hit formula so far because Ive only been working on melee, but I can easily make it for range and magic when I need to)

Read full topic

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Nice, I hope this makes it though. Good luck with the development.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

Yea, but I requested a lock on it because I was just brushing up on my programming skills and I fucked a lot of things up on the way, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Wasn’t there a thread about it a few weeks ago? Regardless, good luck.

Read full topic

@Aeronity wrote:

[center][size=18pt][font=impact]Cyberus
[/font][/size][/center]

Cyberus is a 317 Hyperion based server. The main goal of this project is the combat. It’s going to be perfect. If you are interested in helping programming the server post on my development team thread which can be found at the end of this thread.
